body:
It's been longer than a week since the last roundup, so I figured it was time. Since the first 0.3 alpha release, the following items have been implemented:

  • Smart Playlists can now be edited via the GUI
  • The beginnings of the Preferences dialog
  • Rating display, and the ability to change the rating of the currently playing track

Before the next alpha (and it will still be alpha), we plan on getting the Makefile working, ratings complete, and at least a working version of the Preferences dialog. I'll let you know how it goes :)

Restored from VimTips archive

This article was restored from the VimTips archive. There's probably missing images and broken links (and even some flash references), but it was still important to me to bring them back.
